name: gaki
description:
Join gaki on his quest to collect eyeballs.

This game was made in 48 hours for Pizza Jam by Jimmy Cushnie, Brooke Morgan, Lauren X Pham and Emmanuel Lagumbay.

You can listen to or download the original soundtrack here: 

  • main menu theme
  • gameplay music

Warning: this game has a bug where the background is invisible on Internet Explorer and Edge. Please use a different browser or download the game.
